title: Zach Eliason
text:
I’m a bioinformatician interested in:

🦠 Cancer immunology
🤖 Deep learning (particularly GNNs)
🏥 Translational research
🧬 Genetics

I have expertise in a variety of coding tools and languages (Python, AI/ML, PyTorch, R, C++, scripting/automation, AWS cloud computing, database management (SQL & NoSQL), version control, web programming), domain knowledge in genetics and immunology, and am proficient in design software (Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign).
